values: You see, in this world there's two kinds of people, my friend: Those with loaded guns and those who dig. You dig.
God is with us because he hates the yanks too!

When you have to shoot, shoot. Don't talk.
The standoff begins...
[Reading a letter] "See you soon, idiots". It's for you.
Mr. Hunt, this isn't mission difficult, it's mission impossible.
This log will self-destruct in five seconds. Good luck!

Let's do this! One...two...three...toast...TOAST!
Intercepting com...
You command is done now sir, the orchestra has stopped playing...
